name: Slow Cooker Chicken Marrakesh
author: KCOOPER78
summary: I have been making this Moroccan-style recipe for years. It's so easy to make, it has become a tradition in our household.
ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes, peeled and diced
1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 2-inch pieces
directions: Place the onion, garlic, carrots, sweet potatoes, garbanzo beans, and chicken breast pieces into a slow cooker
In a bowl, mix the cumin, turmeric, cinnamon, black pepper, parsley, and salt, and sprinkle over the chicken and vegetables
Pour in the tomatoes, and stir to combine
Cover the cooker, set to High, and cook until the sweet potatoes are tender and the sauce has thickened, 4 to 5 hours
